text: Eghtɨma gumaziba ia gɨfueghan koghtɨma, dughiar ia men nguibam ataghraghamim, ia uan dagaribar mɨneziba apɨsigh, eghtɨma me fogh suam, arazir me amizir kam, a derazir pu.”(9:5) Judabar arazim kara, nɨ me baraghan koghtɨma, me nɨn sagh, uan dagarir asuaba mɨneziba apɨzighɨva nɨ ategh igharagh mangam. Ezɨ en arazim kamakɨn, kɨ nɨ mɨkɨmtɨ nɨ na baraghan koghtɨ, kɨ apem apɨrigh uan tuavim gighuvagh, egh suam, kɨ nɨn sagham.
